pages.text: $(li)End Highlands are a biome composed of the outer islands of the End, forming the hilltops in the center of each island.$(br)$(li)In this Biome you can find Chorus Plants to obtain $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/chorus_fruit)Chorus Fruit$(/l).$(br)$(li)Some creatues like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermen$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/spectre)Spectre$(/l) can be found here too.
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)End Highlands$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
